DOC.brief_title: Is It Possible Predict Pre Term Labor Measuring Cervical Length Non-pregnant Uterus ?
DOC.detailed_description: Women invite undergo examination Ultrasound Unit Department Obstetrics Gynecology , HaEmek Medical Center . Ultrasound examination perform use Voluson E8 device , General Electric . The cervical length , external internal orifice measure use conventional technology available include : Doppler , three dimensional two dimensional ultrasound .
DOC.criteria: Nonpregnant woman age 1840 year . Singelton last pregnancy . Last birth , spontaneous premature ( 2437 week ) Last birth least 3 month ago . Presence uterine malformation . Sonographic pathologic finding . Technical failure ( failed appropiate sonographic visualisation ) Presence fetal malformation ( preterm delivery ) Presence comorbidities include diabetes , hypertension , collagen disease , thrombophilia Presence risk factor premature delivery ( amniotic fluid infection , cervical surgical treatment conization , polyhydramnios , etc . ) .
